summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of ALASKAN WAY, southwesterly side only, from Lenore Street to vine Street; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; as authorized by Ordinance No. 101004, creating Local Improvement District No. 6538; changing the name from the Sewer Fund to Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund; increasing the amount of said fund aid to said local improvement district; amending Section 2 of said ordinance; and cancelling Ordinance No. 101470, relating thereto, in its entirety.
